channel.title: BrutalScape | Bossing | Skilling | Eco-Server |
channel.description:
[URL=http://"www.BrutalScape.com"][CENTER][IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/2m5fkep.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/8Qx5qyo.gif[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][SIZE=4]Here at Brutalscape we give a warm welcome! We have a great community, and will be able to help you 24/7 with any problems. Our servers are built from the communities ideas, and constantly updating to ensure everyone is happy!
Our features include: - 24 / 7 Online Server - Drygore - Chaotics - Dragon Kite - Godbows - Torva/pernix/vitrus - Working ring of wealth - Summoning & Hunter - Duo slayer & dungeoneering - 18+ Bosses - Grand Exchange - Revenants - 100+ Achievements! - Ingame Player Panel - Working CC and Lootshare - Weekly Lottery - Dicing - Loyalty Titles [/SIZE][/B][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Client[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/2iadco1.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Trailer[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gN3OEc__GV0[/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Shops[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/2l9h6ko.png[/img] [IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/2hy9sw7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/2hcevdv.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Bosses[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/n1wbvl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i67.tinypic.com/2ed4al5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/fjdeg4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i64.tinypic.com/ipmez5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i63.tinypic.com/316uo9k.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Links: [URL=http://brutalscape.com/home/]HOME[/URL] [URL=http://brutalscape.com/forum/]FORUM[/URL] [URL=http://brutalscape.com/hiscores/]HISCORES[/URL] [URL=http://brutalscape.com/store/]STORE[/URL][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=4]Thanks for checking us out, we hope to see you online! You can download the client Via our homepage![/SIZE][/CENTER]
